reviewText: The order arrived on time and was as describe by the seller.  in my whole life i always 49 ers fan and When i get this DVD and watch it,  I get to know the history of the 49 ers and how the won all five championships during 1980 and early 1990.
summary: NFL Super Bowl Collection- San Francisco 49 ers.
Title: NFL Super Bowl Collection - San Francisco 49ers

reviewText: I bought this hoping it would really go into detail about each of the 5 49er Superbowls but they really did not get into the the games that much. They just showed highlights of what happened in the season of the year they went to the Superbowls and just highlights of the game itself. There is special features of some players like Young and Rice but they are just interviews from 1999 and 1996 that originally aired on ESPN years ago. Nothing new is on here just old NFL Films shows that they made for ESPN. Very disappointed. They most definitely could have gone into more detail on each game. Terrible.
Title: NFL Super Bowl Collection - San Francisco 49ers

reviewText: I bought this hoping that I would get to see highlights of each of the five years the 49ers won the super bowl instead they showed highlights of other teams seasons and not the 49ers like I wanted. It was just a general over view of each season and even had segaments talking about other teams and not the 49ers. I did think that the highlights of the super bowls were very good and even the interviews of some of the players were very good.
Title: NFL Super Bowl Collection - San Francisco 49ers

reviewText: NFL Films did a great job on this package of the 5 SB wins by the Niners!Since I had season tix for them during the 80s, I'm just slightly biased (you think?).... ha!
Title: NFL Super Bowl Collection - San Francisco 49ers

reviewText: I am very disappointed in the DVDs I purchased. 15 different supposed super bowl collection series DVDs. A series in which a different super bowl was what the cover depicts for each team. THE SUPER BOWL CHAMPIONS then it gives the number of the super bowl in roman numerals. Other have Americans game the SUPER BOWL CHAMPIONSHIP and shows the ring on the cover. Did I miss something? Would that mean the game is what the DVD is about?  Wrong the only super bowls I have received in their eternity are the two Broncos' super bowls of the Super Bowl XXXII and Super Bowl XXXIII that came along with the 1977 AFC Championship Game in a three set entitled the Broncos 3 greatest games. Said nothing about super bowl games. The only reason I knew the super bowl games were included was I had researched it on another website what I should have done for these. All very misleading. Now I have to go through the hassle of returning 13 DVD. Very disappointed.NFL Super Bowl Collection - San Francisco 49ers
Title: NFL Super Bowl Collection - San Francisco 49ers

reviewText: One of the GREATEST purchases I have ever made!!!!!!! Montana is the Man!!!!!! SORRY STEVE!! Watching these Dvds brought back some of my favorite moments in Superbwl History!!!!!
Title: NFL Super Bowl Collection - San Francisco 49ers

reviewText: What a great opportunity to see one of the greatest sports phenomenons in all Football history. Never again will we see 49er teams with such magic and such amazing players. These DVD's are a reminder of how far the 49er franchise has fallen from grace. All 49er fans need this set.
Title: NFL Super Bowl Collection - San Francisco 49ers
